Drone

I love capturing professional, high-quality photos and videos with my DJI Mavic Pro drone. If you're interested in unique perspectives and angles for events like weddings, photoshoots, local sports events, etc., let's talk! If you just want beautiful prints of any size, that works, too. Check out my @bronxviews Instagram drone page for even more sample photos and videos than the ones below.

You'll love the results from our partnership; if not, you get your money back. Let's get creative and have fun with this — drone@danelsonrosa.com!
